name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 1)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
Investigators lose the game if Walter Gilman is discarded for any reason.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 2)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
If Yig awakens, the investigator that has Walter Gilman as an ally is devoured.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 3)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
The investigator that has Walter Gilman as an ally can't have more than one monster trophy at a time.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 4)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
The investigator that has Walter Gilman can't get rid of his Curse, but is not affected by The Dark Pharaoh - Blood Will Boil ability

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 5)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
The Investigator that has Walter Gilman as an ally cannot gain clue tokens in any way.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 6)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
The Investigator that has Walter Gilman as an ally receives one additional Madness card each time he/she needs to draw one.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 7)
description:
+1 Focus
+1 Lore
Each time a Weather card is discarded, the investigator that has Gilman as an ally loses 1 Stamina.

name: Walter Gilman (Chapter 8)
description:
-1 Focus
+2 Lore
-1 Speed
You must have Gilman as an ally in order to win the game.
